Symptoms: Runny nose, sneezing, sore throat, mild fever, congestion, watery eyes
Preparation: Boil fresh ginger slices in water for 10 minutes, strain, and add honey before drinking.
Dosage/Usage: Drink 2-3 cups of ginger tea daily. Continue for 3-5 days.
Precautions: Rest well. Avoid cold drinks. Stay warm. Wash hands frequently.
Possible Causes: Viral infection (rhinovirus), weakened immunity, weather changes, contact with infected person
Home Tips: Steam inhalation 2-3× daily. Drink warm lemon water. Eat vitamin C rich fruits. Rest adequately.

Symptoms: Dry cough, wet cough, throat irritation, chest congestion, wheezing
Preparation: Warm a cup of milk and add 1 tsp turmeric powder. Drink before bed.
Dosage/Usage: Drink 1 cup turmeric milk before bed daily for 5-7 days.
Precautions: Avoid dairy if you have phlegm. Don't smoke. Stay hydrated.
Possible Causes: Viral infection, bacterial infection, allergies, irritants (smoke, pollution), post-nasal drip
Home Tips: Eat honey with black pepper. Drink warm water frequently. Avoid cold foods.

Symptoms: Bloating, stomach pain, gas, nausea, heartburn, loss of appetite
Preparation: Soak 1 tsp carom seeds in warm water for 10 minutes and drink.
Dosage/Usage: Take 1 tsp carom seeds with warm water 2× daily after meals.
Precautions: Eat slowly. Avoid overeating. Stay upright after meals.
Possible Causes: Overeating, eating too fast, fatty/spicy foods, stress, food intolerance
Home Tips: Eat slowly and chew well. Include ginger in meals. Drink buttermilk. Avoid carbonated drinks.

Symptoms: Burning sensation in chest, sour taste, heartburn, stomach pain, nausea
Preparation: Drink a glass of plain cold milk without sugar.
Dosage/Usage: Drink 1 glass cold milk when experiencing heartburn.
Precautions: Avoid spicy, oily, fried foods. Don't lie down immediately after eating.
Possible Causes: Excess stomach acid, spicy/oily foods, obesity, hiatal hernia, certain medications
Home Tips: Eat smaller portions. Include cucumber in diet. Chew food thoroughly. Drink jeera water.

Symptoms: Pain in head, heaviness, sensitivity to light, tension, migraine, dizziness
Preparation: Apply a few drops of peppermint oil on temples and massage gently.
Dosage/Usage: Apply and massage peppermint oil 2-3× daily as needed.
Precautions: Rest in dark quiet room. Avoid screen time. Stay hydrated.
Possible Causes: Tension, stress, lack of sleep, dehydration, eye strain, sinus issues, hormonal changes
Home Tips: Apply cold compress on forehead. Drink plenty of water. Practice relaxation. Avoid loud noise.

Symptoms: Difficulty in passing stools, bloating, abdominal pain, hard stools, straining
Preparation: Mix 1 tsp isabgol in a glass of warm water and drink before bed.
Dosage/Usage: Take 1 tsp isabgol with warm water at bedtime daily.
Precautions: Drink 8-10 glasses of water daily. Avoid processed foods. Exercise regularly.
Possible Causes: Low fiber diet, dehydration, lack of exercise, ignoring urge to go, certain medications
Home Tips: Eat papaya and prunes. Exercise daily. Drink warm water in morning. Eat at regular times.

Symptoms: Painful swallowing, throat irritation, scratchiness, hoarseness, swollen glands
Preparation: Mix 1 tsp salt in warm water and gargle 2–3 times daily.
Dosage/Usage: Gargle with saltwater 3-4 times daily, especially morning and night.
Precautions: Stay hydrated. Avoid cold drinks. Rest your voice. Don't share utensils.
Possible Causes: Viral infection, bacterial infection, allergies, dry air, irritants, voice strain
Home Tips: Drink warm liquids. Use humidifier. Eat soft foods. Suck on lozenges or hard candy.

Symptoms: Pimples, oily skin, redness, blackheads, whiteheads, inflammation
Preparation: Apply fresh aloe vera gel directly on affected area twice daily.
Dosage/Usage: Apply fresh aloe vera gel twice daily on clean skin.
Precautions: Don't pop pimples. Use clean towels. Avoid touching face frequently.
Possible Causes: Hormonal changes, excess oil production, bacteria, clogged pores, stress, diet
Home Tips: Use non-comedogenic products. Wash face 2× daily. Change pillowcase frequently. Drink plenty of water.

Symptoms: Pain in tooth, swelling, sensitivity, throbbing pain, jaw pain
Preparation: Dip a cotton ball in clove oil and apply on the affected tooth.
Dosage/Usage: Apply clove oil on affected tooth 2-3× daily for pain relief.
Precautions: See dentist if pain persists. Avoid chewing on affected side.
Possible Causes: Dental cavity, gum disease, tooth abscess, damaged filling, tooth fracture
Home Tips: Rinse mouth with warm saltwater. Avoid sugary foods. Apply ice pack outside cheek.

Symptoms: Difficulty sleeping, restlessness, frequent waking, anxiety, fatigue
Preparation: Steep chamomile flowers in hot water for 5 minutes, strain, and drink before bed.
Dosage/Usage: Drink 1 cup chamomile tea 30 minutes before bedtime daily.
Precautions: Avoid caffeine after 2 PM. Keep bedroom cool and dark. Avoid screens before bed.
Possible Causes: Stress, anxiety, depression, poor sleep habits, medications, caffeine, irregular schedule
Home Tips: Keep consistent sleep schedule. Read before bed. Avoid heavy meals at night. Keep room dark.

Symptoms: High temperature, chills, sweating, body ache, weakness, headache
Preparation: Boil willow bark in water for 15 minutes, strain and drink twice daily.
Dosage/Usage: Drink willow bark tea twice daily for 3-5 days or until fever subsides.
Precautions: Stay hydrated. Rest. Monitor temperature. Seek medical help if fever >103°F.
Possible Causes: Viral or bacterial infection, inflammation, immune response, heat exhaustion
Home Tips: Sponge bath with lukewarm water. Wear light clothing. Rest completely. Eat light nutritious food.

Symptoms: Fever, headache, body ache, fatigue, chills, weakness, loss of appetite
Preparation: Boil fresh ginger in water for 10 minutes, add honey and lemon juice.
Precautions: Rest completely. Drink plenty of fluids. Avoid solid food if nauseous.
Possible Causes: Viral infections (flu, dengue, chikungunya), seasonal changes, low immunity
Home Tips: Take paracetamol 500mg every 6 hours. Use cold compress on forehead. Drink ORS solution.

Symptoms: Temperature above 102°F, severe headache, body pain, chills, sweating
Preparation: Sponge body with cold water every 2 hours. Take paracetamol 500mg.
Dosage/Usage: Paracetamol 500mg every 6 hours. Cold sponging every 2 hours.
Precautions: Seek immediate medical help if fever >103°F. Monitor breathing and consciousness.
Possible Causes: Severe viral/bacterial infection, malaria, typhoid, pneumonia
Home Tips: Take ibuprofen 400mg if paracetamol ineffective. Use ice packs on forehead. Maintain electrolyte balance.

Symptoms: High fever, headache, abdominal pain, weakness, rose-colored rash
Preparation: Consult doctor for antibiotic prescription (usually Azithromycin or Ciprofloxacin).
Dosage/Usage: Complete antibiotic course as prescribed. Usually 7-14 days.
Precautions: Strict bed rest. Boiled water only. Avoid street food. Complete antibiotic course.
Possible Causes: Salmonella typhi bacteria, contaminated food/water, poor sanitation
Home Tips: Take prescribed antibiotics (Azithromycin 500mg daily). Maintain fluid intake. Eat easily digestible food.

Symptoms: Periodic fever with chills, headache, vomiting, sweating, fatigue
Preparation: Consult doctor immediately for blood test and antimalarial drugs.
Dosage/Usage: Take prescribed antimalarials (Artemether-Lumefantrine or Chloroquine) as directed.
Precautions: Immediate medical attention required. Use mosquito nets. Take full medication course.
Possible Causes: Plasmodium parasite transmitted by Anopheles mosquito bites
Home Tips: Take prescribed antimalarials completely. Use mosquito repellents. Sleep under treated nets.

Symptoms: Loose stools, frequent bowel movements, abdominal cramps, dehydration, nausea
Preparation: Eat only bananas, rice, applesauce, and toast for 24-48 hours.
Dosage/Usage: Follow BRAT diet strictly for 24-48 hours until symptoms improve.
Precautions: Stay very well hydrated. Avoid dairy temporarily. Wash hands frequently.
Possible Causes: Viral/bacterial infection, food poisoning, medications, food intolerance, parasites
Home Tips: Drink oral rehydration solution. Eat plain rice. Avoid dairy temporarily. Rest.

Symptoms: Feeling sick, urge to vomit, dizziness, loss of appetite, stomach discomfort
Preparation: Chew small piece of fresh ginger or drink ginger tea every 2-3 hours.
Dosage/Usage: Chew small piece of ginger or drink ginger tea every 2-3 hours.
Precautions: Eat small meals. Avoid strong smells. Stay hydrated. Rest.
Possible Causes: Food poisoning, motion sickness, pregnancy, medications, anxiety, migraine
Home Tips: Smell fresh lemon. Sit in fresh air. Eat small amounts. Avoid greasy foods.

Symptoms: Lower back pain, muscle stiffness, spasms, difficulty moving, radiating pain
Preparation: Apply hot compress for 15 minutes, then cold for 15 minutes. Repeat 3 times.
Dosage/Usage: Apply alternating hot and cold compress for 15 minutes each, 3× daily.
Precautions: Maintain good posture. Avoid heavy lifting. Sleep on firm mattress.
Possible Causes: Muscle strain, poor posture, lifting heavy objects, arthritis, herniated disc, stress
Home Tips: Sleep on firm surface. Use lumbar support. Apply heating pad. Do gentle stretches.

Symptoms: Nervousness, worry, restlessness, rapid heartbeat, sweating, trembling
Preparation: Breathe in for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 6. Repeat 10 times.
Dosage/Usage: Practice deep breathing 10 minutes, 3× daily or whenever feeling anxious.
Precautions: Avoid caffeine and alcohol. Exercise regularly. Get adequate sleep.
Possible Causes: Stress, genetic factors, traumatic event, medical conditions, medications, caffeine
Home Tips: Exercise regularly. Practice meditation. Talk to someone. Maintain sleep routine. Limit alcohol.
